page.title: 04BURTON JOYCE-CLUBS
page.content: Many activities are available in the village for both adults and children. There are packs of Brownies, Cubs, Scouts, and Guides,a Youth Club, Church choirs and drama clubs,Evening classes at the Primary School and a park for children to play in. There is a dance and drama studio,an art club,a thriving drama group - Burton Joyce Players,a slimming club and a junior fitness club.Three tennis courts are available in the village, while the River Trent is conveniently situated for fishing. There are also the library,Women's Institute,2 playgroups and three public houses:Cross Keys, Lord Nelson and Wheatsheaf (with a restaurant and play area) and many public footpaths for the more energetic villagers.
